name: Pay ur loans!
description:
Your money in your wallet sprouted wings and flew away. Now Loan Sharks are after you because you didn’t pay your student loans. Reclaim your lost money and defeat the loan sharks before they snatch your wig!

‘Pay your Loans!’ gameplay is a platformer game that is a comical approach to the relatable experience college students have upon paying their student loans. The lack of money is a relatable experience for college students as we portrayed this through the money with wings flying away. The game depicts the player as a college student running around an obstacle course recollecting their money before the deadline (timer) as they try to avoid Loan Sharks from taking all their money. They are fueled by energy drinks which gives them a boost in agility. 

Use arrow keys to move the player and use the spacebar to shoot enemies. 

  • Kendra Shu: Main Programmer, Game Mechanics
  • Kristy Mihalyi: Art, Sound, and Level Designer
  • Player, Enemy, and Weapon Sprites and Level Design done by Kristy Mihalyi

Release Date: March 13, 2019
